events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund based on their request for money back.
Assigning this refund case to the refund specialist team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want a refund and Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know the reason why you want to return the item?
The order number is 123456, and the product does not match the description on your website.
We can process a full refund once you send the item back to our warehouse with the provided return label.
Thank you, I appreciate the quick response. I will send the package back today and follow the return instructions.
We have received your returned item and have now processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard any further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
